## indent() function

Indent a string by the specified number of spaces.

Adds indentation at the start of each line while preserving ANSI escape sequences.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function indent(s: string, spaces: number, options?: IndentOptions): string;
```

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indentation options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

The indented string

## Example


```ts
indent("hello\nworld", 4);
// "    hello\n    world"
```
